title: bhaja mAnasa
sahitya:
bhaja mAnasa shrI vAsudEvam nija bhakta bhavAmbudhi bhavyanAvam


anupallavi

  aja rudrEndrAdi dEva nAyakam gaja rAjEndra mOkSadAyakam


caraNam    satya bhAmAnvitam satya bhAmanvitam satya pAlana niratam santatam
nitya trpta-mangaLam shrta pArijAtam nrtta gIta sakta cittam satatam
